trans-unit.source: A full-screen, console-based Python debugger
trans-unit.target: Un depurador Python de pantalla completa,basado en la consola

trans-unit.source: Ability to control the debugger from a separate terminal.
trans-unit.target: Capacidad de controlar el depurador desde una terminal separada.

trans-unit.source: Breakpoints can be set just by pointing at a source line and hitting “b” and then edited visually in the breakpoints window. Or hit “t” to run to the line under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Breakpoints can be set just by pointing at a source line and hitting “b” and then edited visually in the breakpoints window. Or hit “t” to run to the line under the cursor.

trans-unit.source: Development Version
trans-unit.target: Versión de desarrollo

trans-unit.source: Drop to a Python shell in the current environment by pressing “!”.
trans-unit.target: Drop to a Python shell in the current environment by pressing “!”.

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: Características

trans-unit.source: Here’s a screenshot:
trans-unit.target: Here’s a screenshot:

trans-unit.source: IPython integration (see wiki)
trans-unit.target: IPython integration (see wiki)

trans-unit.source: Its goal is to provide all the niceties of modern GUI-based debuggers in a more lightweight and keyboard-friendly package. PuDB allows you to debug code right where you write and test it–in a terminal. If you’ve worked with the excellent (but nowadays ancient) DOS-based Turbo Pascal or C tools, PuDB’s UI might look familiar.
trans-unit.target: Its goal is to provide all the niceties of modern GUI-based debuggers in a more lightweight and keyboard-friendly package. PuDB allows you to debug code right where you write and test it–in a terminal. If you’ve worked with the excellent (but nowadays ancient) DOS-based Turbo Pascal or C tools, PuDB’s UI might look familiar.

trans-unit.source: Links
trans-unit.target: Enlaces

trans-unit.source: PuDB also has a mailing list that you may use to submit patches and requests for help. You can also send a pull request to the GitHub repository
trans-unit.target: PuDB also has a mailing list that you may use to submit patches and requests for help. You can also send a pull request to the GitHub repository

trans-unit.source: PuDB documentation
trans-unit.target: Documentación de la BDP

trans-unit.source: PuDB places special emphasis on exception handling. A post-mortem mode makes it easy to retrace a crashing program’s last steps.
trans-unit.target: PuDB places special emphasis on exception handling. A post-mortem mode makes it easy to retrace a crashing program’s last steps.

trans-unit.source: Should work with Python 2.7 and newer, including Python 3.
trans-unit.target: Debería funcionar con Python 2.7 y más reciente,incluyendo Python 3.

trans-unit.source: Simple, keyboard-based navigation using single keystrokes makes debugging quick and easy. PuDB understands cursor-keys and Vi shortcuts for navigation. Other keys are inspired by the corresponding pdb commands.
trans-unit.target: La navegación sencilla basada en el teclado con una sola pulsación de tecla hace que la depuración sea rápida y fácil.PuDB entiende las teclas de cursor y los atajos de Vi para la navegación.Otras teclas se inspiran en los correspondientes comandos de pdb.

trans-unit.source: Syntax-highlighted source, the stack, breakpoints and variables are all visible at once and continuously updated. This helps you be more aware of what’s going on in your program. Variable displays can be expanded, collapsed and have various customization options.
trans-unit.target: Syntax-highlighted source, the stack, breakpoints and variables are all visible at once and continuously updated. This helps you be more aware of what’s going on in your program. Variable displays can be expanded, collapsed and have various customization options.

trans-unit.source: The repository is also mirrored at GitHub.
trans-unit.target: The repository is also mirrored at GitHub.

trans-unit.source: Use search to find relevant source code, or use “m” to invoke the module browser that shows loaded modules, lets you load new ones and reload existing ones.
trans-unit.target: Use search to find relevant source code, or use “m” to invoke the module browser that shows loaded modules, lets you load new ones and reload existing ones.

trans-unit.source: You may also browse the code online.
trans-unit.target: You may also browse the code online.

trans-unit.source: You may obtain the development version using the Git version control tool.:
trans-unit.target: You may obtain the development version using the Git version control tool.:

trans-unit.source: You may watch a screencast, too.
trans-unit.target: You may watch a screencast, too.
